data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Campos, Ernesto, Vargas-Castillo, Rita (2013): Pinnotheres orcutti Rathbun, 1918, a new Eastern Tropical Pacific species of Tumidotheres Campos, 1989 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Pinnotheridae). Zootaxa 3666 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3666.1.8
